ParameterFields.Name: Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
'Normal' just checks all the switches it should and then sets 'Switch to Set'.
'Check for unset after set' does the same, but if any of the switches to check are ever unset, 'Switch to Set' will also be unset.
'Time limit check' starts a time limit once the first switch to check has been set, you must set the other ones within it.
'Normal with 65 frames delayed set' waits 65 frames after the last switch to check is set before setting 'Switch to Set'.

ParameterFields.Name: First Switch to Check
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
The first switch index to check. If this is 0, use (Switch to Set + 1) as the first switch to check instead.
The other switches it checks are sequential after the first one. For example, if the first switch is 5, and 'Num Switches to Check' is 3, it will check switches 5, 6, and 7.

ParameterFields.Name: Switch to Set
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The switch to be set once all the switches to check have been set.

ParameterFields.Name: Event
ParameterFields.ToolTip: The event to start once all the switches to check have been set.

ParameterFields.Name: Time Limit (Half Seconds)
ParameterFields.ToolTip: For the 'Time limit check' type, this number times 15 frames is how long the player has to set all the switches after the first switch is set.
